title.rendered: Oslo Børs – AQUA – New security is quoted as from 13.08.2014

content.rendered:
New security is quoted as from 13.08.2014:

Name: Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA
Ticker: AQUA
Instrument ID: 1301198
ISIN: NO0010715394
Segment: OBNW
Instrument Type: Share (SH)
Country of register: NO – NORWAY
Trading Currency: NOK
Exchange Market Size (EMS): 1000
Face value: NOK 0.10
Number of shares for listing: 43 190 544

Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA is classified as “10101020 – Oil & Gas Equipment & Services” in GICS (Global Industry Classification Standard)
